      • XOR

        public static byte[] XOR(byte[] array1,
                         byte[] array2)
        Performs an XOR operation on two arrays of bytes, byte by byte. The returned array will be the same length as the longest parameter array, the shorter array will be padded with 0's.
        Parameters:
        array1 -
        array2 -
        Returns:
        array1 XOR array2.

      • cleanXOR

        public static byte[] cleanXOR(byte[] a,
                              byte[] b)
        returns a XOR b, leaves a and b unchanged uses 3n memory (or more depending on array size and JVM settings) where n is the length of a & b. does no error checking to make sure a & b are same length
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        Returns:
        a XOR b

        Parameters:

        b -
        c -
        Returns:
        (a^b)%c
